markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lizardfolk Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=1050) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=226" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 58 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You listened carefully to the tales passed down among your community. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) and [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16). If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Iruxi [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8).
name: Lizardfolk Lore
